text: Being a mom is hard, I think a lot of working moms feel that way.
author: Gwen Stefani

text: My mom always said I was the peacemaker in the family. My older brother, Eric, was the leader, the creative one. I was just his puppet.
author: Gwen Stefani

text: I was thinking that when I have children, that I should always dress as a character for them, so they think their mom is Alice in Wonderland or Cinderella. It would be totally messed up!
author: Gwen Stefani

text: My mom and dad met at Anaheim High School. After they got married, all they wanted to do was have four children, and they did.
author: Gwen Stefani

text: I wish I had an extra day with my mom sometimes. Or another hour in the day with my family, husband and children.
author: Mary J. Blige
